docs.snippet: Netflix has gone live in nearly every country in the world, rapidly accelerating its plan to be fully global by the end of this year. China is a major exception....
docs.lead_paragraph: Netflix has gone live in nearly every country in the world, rapidly accelerating its plan to be fully global by the end of this year. China is a major exception.
docs.abstract: Netflix goes live with its streaming television service in 130 more countries, for total of 190 worldwide, in line with its aggressive expansion; one major exception is China, which boasts 25 percent of world's broadband households.

headline.main: At CES, Netflix Adds Over 130 Countries to Streaming Service
headline.print_headline: Netflix Flips a Global Switch, With China Notably Absent

docs.snippet: Oi SA, Brazil's most indebted phone carrier, has started talks with the controlling shareholder of rival TIM Participações SA over a merger, with discussions initially focusing on governance issues, two sources with direct knowledge of t...
docs.lead_paragraph: Oi SA, Brazil's most indebted phone carrier, has started talks with the controlling shareholder of rival TIM Participações SA over a merger, with discussions initially focusing on governance issues, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter said on Thursday.

headline.main: Exclusive: Telecom Italia, Oi in Talks as Brazil May Ease Rules-Sources
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Telecom Italia, Oi in Talks as Brazil May Ease Rules-Sources

headline.main: South Korea Seeks U.S. Strategic Weapons After North's Nuclear Test
headline.print_headline: South Korea Seeks U.S. Strategic Weapons After North's Nuclear Test

docs.snippet: The global Brent oil benchmark price fell to below $35 a barrel, the lowest level since the depths of the 2008-9 economic downturn, helping to push stock markets lower....
docs.lead_paragraph: The global Brent oil benchmark price fell to below $35 a barrel, the lowest level since the depths of the 2008-9 economic downturn, helping to push stock markets lower.
docs.abstract: Oil prices plummet again by more than 5 percent as global stockpiles grow; benchmark price has fallen below $35 a barrel.

headline.main: Oil Prices Decline More Than 5 Percent as Stockpiles Increase
headline.print_headline: Oil Prices Decline More Than 5 Percent as Stockpiles Increase

docs.snippet: Resolution of a five-year impasse over the International Monetary Fund and other moves in 2015 eased concerns about America’s global economic role....
docs.lead_paragraph: Resolution of a five-year impasse over the International Monetary Fund and other moves in 2015 eased concerns about America’s global economic role.
docs.abstract: News Analysis; Congressional overhaul of International Monetary Fund, ending five-year impasse, may give United States vital lift in its global economic leadership role; US growth is seen as buoying world.

headline.main: I.M.F. Breakthrough Is Seen to Bolster U.S. on World Stage
headline.print_headline: Deal to Overhaul I.M.F. May Give U.S. Image a Vital Lift

docs.snippet: The White House press secretary and South Korean analysts say that the estimated yield, or energy, from the explosion appeared to be too small for a hydrogen bomb....
docs.lead_paragraph: The White House press secretary and South Korean analysts say that the estimated yield, or energy, from the explosion appeared to be too small for a hydrogen bomb.
docs.abstract: United Nations Security Council condemns North Korea for conducting nuclear test, yet China, which is North's most powerful backer, gives no indication that it will support stronger sanctions; United States officials raise doubts about whether test was actually of hydrogen bomb.

headline.main: Security Council Condemns Nuclear Test by North Korea
headline.print_headline: Security Council Condemns a Test by North Korea

byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta reported from the United Nations, David E. Sanger from Washington and Choe Sang-Hun from Seoul, South Korea. Gardiner Harris contributed reporting from Washington, Javier C. Hernández from Beijing, and Jonathan Soble from Tokyo.
byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA, DAVID E. SANGER and CHOE SANG-HUN

docs.snippet: Warnings of widespread starvation are growing as pro-government forces besiege an opposition-held town in Syria and winter bites, darkening the already bleak outlook for peace talks the United Nations hopes to convene this month....

docs.snippet: Fewer than 200 people live in the Chilean outpost, which was founded in 1984, when Chile was seeking to bolster its claims in Antarctica....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fewer than 200 people live in the Chilean outpost, which was founded in 1984, when Chile was seeking to bolster its claims in Antarctica.
docs.abstract: Villa Las Estrellas Journal; Chilean village located in Antarctica is rare civilian settlement on continent where most nations send only researchers; outpost was founded as part of territorial rivalry with neighboring Argentina; residents of Villa Las Estrellas relish novelty of region's culture, climate and geography.

headline.main: Antarctic Life: No Dogs, Few Vegetables and ‘a Little Intense’ in the Winter
headline.print_headline: Long Nights and No Dogs Allowed for Chilean Families Settling in Antarctica

byline.contributor: Pascale Bonnefoy contributed reporting from Santiago, Chile.

docs.snippet: The detonation that rocked Northeast Asia is a reminder that North Korea was on an atomic spending spree while U.S. negotiators focused on Iran....
docs.lead_paragraph: The detonation that rocked Northeast Asia is a reminder that North Korea was on an atomic spending spree while U.S. negotiators focused on Iran.
docs.abstract: News Analysis; North Korea's recent nuclear test underscores Obama administration's lack of genuinely effective strategy for preventing Pyongyang from growing its arsenal; experts call for the kind of creative diplomacy which resulted in Iran nuclear accord.

headline.main: North Korea Blast Revives Question: How Do You Contain Pyongyang?
headline.print_headline: Blast Revives Question of How to Contain North Korea
